rows.name:
Yo, new leader!
Taking on any Merc Group missions?

rows.label: tlk00340106_msg0002
rows.name:
Once you complete some missions and get the hang of it,
we'll give you an important job!

rows.label: tlk00340106_msg0003
rows.name: Make sure you come back to the village every now and then!
